titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States Government should negotiate a multilateral wheat production agreement with the other wheat exporting countries.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade.
Executive Comment Requested from State, USDA, USTR.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received From State.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received From US Trade Rep.

bill.summary: 3/24/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the U.S. Government should negotiate with the other leading wheat exporting countries to: (1) ensure stable and equitable wheat prices through a multilateral wheat production agreement; and (2) eliminate subsidies of commercial wheat exports.
